p: A total of 71 patients were screened and 61 patients were randomized (30 to the FD arm and 31 to the WB arm). The first patient was enrolled on October 13, 2010 and the last patient completed the study on February 26, 2013. Patient characteristics are summarized in Table 1. Due to the inclusion criterion of body weight ≤70 kg, the majority (87%) of patients randomized in this study were enrolled in Taiwan or the Republic of Korea and only 13% of patients were from the United States or Canada. Fifty-seven patients (93%) completed the study and two patients from each group were withdrawn (FD arm: lack of efficacy [ n = 1], protocol violation [ n = 1]; WB arm: reason missing [ n = 1], progressive disease [ n = 1]).
